venue.address_2: Use fitness ctr entrance in rear of bldg
venue.name: Jewish Community Center

item.description:
Ocean State DragonBoat Club is actively recruiting new members for this race season. If you are looking for a great workout and have a competitive edge, we'd love to have you on our team. We practice once a week on Sat. 9:30-10:30am at the Jewish Community Center401 Elmgrove Ave, Providence, RI. We always enjoy seeing new faces and introducing the sport of dragonboat racing to new people. If you're interested please come down and try out a practice.

If you'd like more information please send us an e-mail to info@oceanstatedragons.org.

We look forward to seeing you.

OSDB
item.name: Indoor Pool Practice
